AD_AstarionImmune.synopsis: Astarion is in a cell that drains people of life and turns them into zombies but, being undead already, finds himself immune to it.
AD_AstarionImmune.how_to_trigger: With Astarion -Load SCL_Main_AFrom the debug book, load the Colony through the Necromancer's LabLight the three candles in the centre.

PAD_RitualArea.synopsis: The players come upon a ritual setup where subjects are captured and held in glass containers while the magic drains their life and turns them into undead.
PAD_RitualArea.how_to_trigger: Start colony from the entrance room.Approach the ritual setup near S_COL_NecromancerLab_PAD_RitualArea_c16720bf-5746-4f13-aa04-f683ee970393

AD_Zombie.synopsis: The player interacts with a zombie in the necromancer's lab,
AD_Zombie.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe Necromancer_Assault"- Use command "roll amazing".- Enter the Necromancer Chamber, talk to the Necromancer and talk your way out of it with a skill roll.- Talk to one of the zombies.

AD_MintharaEntersLab_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_MintharaEntersLab_0.text: Whatever experiments Balthazar performed here, I fear he made more than thralls and ghouls.

AD_AstarionImmune_0.speaker: Astarion
AD_AstarionImmune_0.text: Magic that drains life? Oh dear, someone's out of luck.
AD_AstarionImmune_0.context: NodeContext: Trapped in a cell that drains the life from its occupants. Thankfully he's immune - that ship has sailed.

PAD_RitualArea_0.speaker: Player
PAD_RitualArea_0.text: Curious setup. Think I'll keep my distance.
